description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
cue orientation condition- within-subject manipulation (levels=congruent/ incongruent)
location of the reward (l= left/r= right)
whether they chose the correct side (1=yes/ 0= no)
order of cue type block scored as mirror_first and image_first
order of cue type block- numerical
session within cue type block of the experiment-numerical
cue type manipulation (presented in blocks- mirror / image)
whether they chose the side on which the food was visible as a picture or as a mirror image (1= yes/ 0= no)
